sentence.text: These studies suggest that compound 4d behaves well in lowering body weight and maintaining energy expenditure without a chance of hyperglycaemia, 4d has strong clinical potential as an efficient Golgi organization-1/adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway agonist in the prevention and treatment of obesity and dyslipidemia

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway
